title: Finding the X- and Y- Intercepts
text: $$x+2y=8$$. The x-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$x=8$$, and the y-intercept can be calculated by the equation $$2y=8$$. Solving these equations, we get the x-intercept as $$8$$ and the y-intercept as $$4$$. $$8+4=12$$
